description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 3b. Physical description: Part 1, 25 lines per page; written in small naskh with elements of nastaʻliq in black. Part 2, 25 lines per page; written in medium naskh in black. Entire manuscript on glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords; a few marginal notes. Edges moldered; marginal damp-staining and mildewing. Origin: Part 1, 29 Shawwāl 1059 H [5 November 1649], by Zayn al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad al-Jazāʻirī (leaf 145b). Part 2 by a different hand, likely around the same time. Incipit: الحمد لله المتفرد بالقدم و الکمال
author: Ibn Fahd, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, 1356 or 1357-1437 or 1438
abstract: Commentary on al-Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī's Mukhtaṣar al-nāfiʻ; incomplete at end.
extent: 266 leaves : paper ; 247 x 172 (170-190 x 91-124) mm bound to 251 x 172 mm
